string.name: app_name
string.context: Name of the MEGA Document Scanner. Keep uppercase

string.name: scan_title_crop
string.context: Screen title for cropping current scan

string.name: scan_title_save_scan
string.context: Screen title for saving current scan

string.name: scan_action_add
string.context: Action text to add a new page

string.name: scan_action_save
string.context: Action text to save document

string.name: scan_action_retake
string.context: Action text to retake current scan picture

string.name: scan_file_name
string.context: Document scanner file name

string.name: scan_file_type
string.context: Input field description in the document save screen

string.name: scan_quality
string.context: Input field description in the document save screen

string.name: scan_destination
string.context: Input field description in the document save screen

string.name: scan_quality_high
string.context: Document scanner high quality option

string.name: scan_quality_medium
string.context: Document scanner medium quality option

string.name: scan_quality_low
string.context: Document scanner low quality option

string.name: scan_dialog_discard_title
string.context: Title text shown on document scanner dialog to discard scan

string.name: scan_dialog_discard_body
string.context: Body text shown on document scanner dialog to discard scan

resources.string: The current scan will be lost

string.name: scan_dialog_discard_all_title
string.context: Title text shown on document scanner dialog to discard scan all scans

string.name: scan_dialog_discard_all_body
string.context: Body text shown on document scanner dialog to discard all scans

resources.string: The current document will be lost

string.name: scan_dialog_discard_action
string.context: Action text shown on document scanner dialog to discard scans

string.name: scan_dialog_delete_body
string.context: Body text shown on document scanner dialog to delete current scan

string.name: scan_requires_permission
string.context: Message shown when users deny camera permissions to scan documents

resources.string: Camera permissions are needed to scan documents

string.name: scan_invalid_input
string.context: Error text for field invalid input
